com.ecs.utils.stellent
Class LWSSFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade
      com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWSSFacade
public class LWSSFacade
extends LWFacade

The class contains a number of Stellent Site Studio functions which utilise the IdcServerBean package.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gordon Sandeman

Constructor Detail

LWSSFacade

public LWSSFacade()
Constructor which creates a LWSSFacade with a connection to port 4444 on the localhost and the sysadmin user.

LWSSFacade

public LWSSFacade(java.lang.String serverName,
                  java.lang.String userName)
Constructor which takes the Stellent server name and the user name the services called on the connection will be validated against. Assumes a default port of 4444.

Parameters:
serverName - Stellent server host name
userName - Stellent user name

LWSSFacade

public LWSSFacade(java.lang.String serverName,
                  java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String port)
Constructor which takes the Stellent server name, user name and server port. Services called on the connection will be validated against the passed user name.

Parameters:
serverName - Stellent server host name
userName - Stellent user name
port - Stellent Content Server port
Method Detail

getSiteMap

public org.w3c.dom.Document getSiteMap(java.lang.String siteId)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a basic XML site map for the requested siteId containing section ids. This method only works for Site Studio Version 7.7.

Parameters:
siteId - Site Studio site id
Returns:
Document containing basic XML representation of the site
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getSiteFile

public org.w3c.dom.Document getSiteFile(java.lang.String siteId)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the SS_PROJECT file for the requested siteId.

Parameters:
siteId - Site Studio site Id
Returns:
Document containing the SS_PROJECT file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getSiteStructure

public java.util.Hashtable getSiteStructure(java.lang.String siteId)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a Hashtable representation of the passed siteId. The Hashtable key is a qualified path to the site section (e.g. /Home/Top_Level_Section/Sub_Section) and the value is the section's nodeId.

Parameters:
siteId - Site Studio site id
Returns:
Hashtable containing fully qualified site sections and their node id
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addNode

public java.lang.String addNode(java.lang.String siteId,
                                java.lang.String nodeId,
                                java.lang.String title)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Adds a new Site Studio section with the name specified by title as a child of the existing section specified by nodeId.

Parameters:
siteId - Site Studio site id
nodeId - Parent section nodeId to whom this node will be added
title - The name of the new section
Returns:
nodeId of newly created section
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

setNodeProperty

public void setNodeProperty(java.lang.String siteId,
                            java.lang.String nodeId,
                            java.lang.String property,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the property of a Site Studio section.

Parameters:
siteId - Site Studio site id
nodeId - Section nodeId whose properties are being set
property - The property name
value - The value the property will be set to
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
